lines: You have just awakened from a nice, long nap. Your mom comes in the room and wants to hold you.

You must be in a very foul mood today. Mood swings such as these are quite common with babies your age. Unfortunately, when babies are too cranky their parents see this as a sign of rejection. Go back to sleep and wake up later.
It's a dog's life, isn't it? Nothing to do all day except eat, sleep and wonder what life will be like when you're older. (Does life really change after 2 ?) Mom is coming closer.

Very good. Eye contact with your caretakers is very reinforcing to them. Parents often mistakenly think that it is the children who need all the attention. Believe me, parents want it, too. Your eye contact with her makes
her smile. Social and Emotional spheres are increasing.
Smiling makes your mom feel especially loving towards you. She brings your face close to her face. Your faces touch.

You just gave your first kiss! This may not seem like a very big deal to you, but it is very important for your mother. The bad part is that now you will have to repeat this act until your entire family becomes aware of your new talent.
You can avoid kissing overly-affectionate relatives by dribbling on them at just the right moment.
You are probably wondering why your mom is doing this. She wants you to kiss her, but now you've lost the opportunity. You will have many more chances to learn this extremely valuable skill.
Too tired to interact now? That's understandable. You did, however, pass up the opportunity for a rewarding social and emotional interaction.
Your mom tries to get your attention by making clicking noises with her mouth and calling your name.
Your mom has coaxed you into attending to her. This makes her feel like she is being a good mother. She smiles at you.
Fickle child! You have hurt your mother's feelings. You could have given her a smile.

This is a great way to make a new mom feel good. Your consideration earns you points in many spheres. You will find that as life progresses pleasing mother becomes harder and harder. In a few years, it will take doing chores and
going to the store. Before you know it, she'll want you to become a doctor or a lawyer. Enjoy your infancy while you can. Your mom picks you up so that your face touches her face.
